Author: The Combat Reborn Team
Name: Rotation Solver Reborn
Description:
Analyses combat information every frame and finds the best action.

This means almost all the information available in one frame in combat, including the status of all players in the party, the status of any hostile targets, skill cooldowns, the MP and HP of characters, the location of characters, casting status of the hostile target, combo, combat duration, player level, etc.
Then, it will highlight the best action on the hot bar, or help you to click on it.
It is designed for `general combat`, not for savage or ultimate. Use it carefully.
Punchline: Analyses combat information every frame and finds the best action.
Changelog:
## What's Changed
* Soul Stack tracking, BraveryPvP modification by @LTS-FFXIV in https://github.com/FFXIV-CombatReborn/RotationSolverReborn/pull/661


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/FFXIV-CombatReborn/RotationSolverReborn/compare/7.2.0.25...7.2.0.26

Author: The Combat Reborn Team

Author: The Combat Reborn Team

Author: The Combat Reborn Team
Name: GatherBuddy Reborn
Description: Adds commands to simplify gathering by finding nodes and fish and their locations via item name and a UI to keep track of special uptime and weather conditions. Also automatically gathers items based on these conditions using lists that you specify. Automated gathering requires vnavmesh.
Punchline: Simplify Gathering and Fishing to the extreme.
Changelog:
## What's Changed
- Added a volume slider for the gathering completion sound

- Increased GBR's max quantity counts to 999999 from 9999

- Added a random 500-2000 millisecond delay when extracting materia
 
Additionally, since there have been ***7 fucking testing releases*** since the last live update, here's a recap of what's changed in the last week:

- Added Diadem support

- Added an option to check retainer inventories when doing inventory calculations

- Items on gathering lists can be enabled or disabled individually

- The Gather Window will now display while in the Diadem

- The Gather Window no longer displays when you're not logged in

- Artisan import functionality has been streamlined to be more user friendly

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/FFXIV-CombatReborn/GatherBuddyReborn/compare/7.2.2.33...7.2.2.41
